summary: This is an email from attorney Robert Glassman forwarding an attachment regarding the estate of Jeffrey E. Epstein, likely containing legal correspondence to a magistrate judge. It includes a confidentiality notice and is part of estate proceedings.

persons.name: Robert Glassman
persons.context: Attorney at Panish Shea & Boyle LLP who sent the email forwarding a legal document related to the Epstein estate.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the estate proceedings mentioned in the email's subject line and attachment.

connections.description: Glassman is an attorney involved in correspondence regarding Epstein's estate proceedings.

events.title: Email Regarding Epstein Estate
events.description: Attorney Robert Glassman sends an email forwarding a legal document (likely a letter to a magistrate) concerning the estate of Jeffrey E. Epstein.

locations: 11111 Santa Monica Boulevard, Suite 700 Los Angeles, CA 90025
keyFacts: Attorney Robert Glassman forwarded a document related to the estate of Jeffrey E. Epstein on September 9, 2020.
The forwarded attachment appears to be a letter to a magistrate judge regarding estate proceedings (ST-19-PB-80 Estate of Jeffrey E. Epstein).
The email includes a detailed confidentiality notice typical of legal correspondence.
The document is part of the legal proceedings surrounding Epstein's estate after his death.
